subject: 关于 VitalSure S3 系列台湾区代理合作的初步咨询
body:
Joja MedTech 团队您好，

我们公司 NeoMediTech Ltd. 有意探索贵公司 VitalSure S3 系列 在台湾市场的代理合作。我们曾代理过 迈瑞（Mindray） 和 理邦（Edan） 等品牌，在本地私人诊所与中小型医院拥有稳定渠道。

为评估合作可行性，烦请协助解答以下问题：


贵公司是否有针对首次合作代理的 价格阶梯或优惠方案？达成代理价是否有最低订单量（MOQ）或首批金额要求？



若出货至 台湾高雄港，能否提供一份 S3 Pro（50台）数量级的 CIF 报价？方便我们评估整体成本。



是否可以考虑 区域独占协议？若有，通常附带的业绩目标为何？



初期是否提供 样机与宣传支持资料？我们预计在明年第一季度展开本地化推广，可能需要中文手册与销售包。


感谢您的协助，如方便亦欢迎安排一次简短通话。
intent: Inquire about agency cooperation for Taiwan

subject: Inquiry for Regional Distribution – Chile
body:
Dear Joja Team,

We are currently evaluating new monitoring solutions for our portfolio in Chile and came across your VitalSure and wireless modules via one of our client hospitals. The form factor looks promising for both private clinic settings and public tenders, but before we go deeper, I need to understand your distribution terms — especially exclusivity conditions for LATAM and estimated dealer pricing per unit for 20–100 units monthly volume.

If you already have partners in Chile, please clarify which segments they cover, otherwise we’d be open to discussing a regional representation model, ideally with access to demo units and marketing co-funding. Lead times, warranty coverage, and logistics from Asia are also relevant here, but first let’s talk about price.

Best,
 Ricardo Méndez
 Managing Director
 MedTrans Chile S.A.
intent: Request information on distribution and pricing

subject: Request for Quotation – Portable Vital Signs Monitors
body:
DearJoja Health Solutions,

I’m currently evaluating options for upgrading our clinic’s vital signs monitoring equipment, and your products came recommended by a colleague who attended MedTech Europe last month. The VersaScan S3 portable monitor looks like a potential fit for our needs.

Could you please provide:


A quotation for 5–10 units including shipping to Prague, Czech Republic;



Technical datasheet and user manual (if available);



Information about integration with existing EMR systems.


We are planning to finalize vendor selection by the end of next month, so your timely response would be appreciated.

Kind regards,
 Martin Novak
 Operations Manager
 WellCare Medical Group
 martin.novak@wellcare.cz
 +420 602 855 731

subject: Final Specs Confirmation and Contract Preparation – Monitoring & Diagnostic Equipment
body:
Dear Joja Health Solutions,

Thank you for the detailed proposal and virtual demo session last week. After internal evaluation, we are moving forward with your VitalSure Pro Series for our upcoming diagnostics lab rollout across three regional branches.

Before we proceed with the contract, we would appreciate clarification on the following:


Final confirmation of unit specs, especially connectivity with our LIS systems



Delivery timeline commitment for all 25 units to our warehouses in Munich, Stuttgart, and Dresden



Invoicing procedures and whether partial shipment is possible



Point of contact for post-sale training and technical support


Assuming these points are confirmed, we aim to sign the contract by next Tuesday and complete procurement before the end of this quarter.

Looking forward to your swift reply.

Warm regards,
 Stefan Klein
 Procurement Director
 HelixCare Diagnostics Group
 stefan.klein@helixcare.de
 +49 89 2193 0034

body: Get excited. Your inbox is up and running with HubSpot.

subject: Re: Next Steps for Chilean Market Launch
body:
Appreciate the response.

Still waiting for the CIF Santiago pricing — not just FOB. Our clients are asking for a landed quote. Can you share a ballpark including shipping, assuming 50 units?

Also, please clarify what sales target you'd expect from a regional distributor like us. We’ve handled similar lines before (Philips, Nihon Kohden re-sellers), so our channel is active. But we need to know how strict your MOQ and performance clauses are.

If we're investing in registration and launch, we’ll also need initial marketing materials (catalogs, demo videos, white-labeled brochures in Spanish if possible). Time is tight if we want to hit Q4.

Let me know if you're open to a call this week — I’m available Wed and Fri.

Regards,
 Ricardo Méndez
 Managing Director
 MedTrans Chile S.A.

subject: Re: Distribution Terms & Pricing – Chile
body:
Thanks for the clarification.

If we’re talking about FOB Shenzhen, then we’ll need an estimate that includes full set (monitor, cables, SPO2/NIBP accessories) — not just the base unit. Please confirm what’s standard and what counts as optional. Also, what’s your MOQ to start a distributorship? If exclusivity is on the table, we’ll need some territorial protection, at least for Southern Cone countries.

One more thing: do you support Spanish-language manuals and packaging out of the box? If not, do you allow local adaptation? We’re looking at a Q4 tender that may require 60–80 units as a first batch, so speed matters.

Best regards,
 Ricardo Méndez
 Managing Director
 MedTrans Chile S.A.
intent: Request for product pricing and distribution terms
